text: Hey all! Does anyone have experience having multiple brands in HubSpot? My use case is having multiple customer databases that must live in silos and I’m trying to understand if I need additional account/portal for each

You really need a higher level/enterprise or separate portals. The tool is intended to work a certain way and trying to hack around it only causes more problems. A someone that tried to make this work for a few different clients that tried to be “low cost” about it—- it doesn’t work well and is a huge pain
